name: Ortus (OrtusGame)
description:
P - Pause -> adjustable mouse sensitivity

WASD - Walk/Drive
Q / E - Push / Pull the boat (remote controlled)
F - Interact (jump in boat)
Left Shift & Ctrl - Shift gear

Current objective: Touch the red squares *NO END STATE!*

https://forms.gle/d4ZgizRYV4GZkjPM9
